title: geophphreigh
author: geophphreigh
created_time: December 09, 2023, 10:34:12 PMLast edit: February 24, 2024, 10:56:34 PM by geophphreigh
content: 2022 Ballet Holiday Cards Full SetsWanted to offer some cards that I have left over from the holidays last year, 2022. These will only be sold as sets of 16 cards, I don't want to sell individual cards.I have a limited number of full sets remaining, so first come first serve.These are the custom plastic Ballet cards that were offered last year, different cards available this year. These cards were personalized "from Satoshi Nakamoto."These cards are sold UNLOADED.4 varieties and 4 denominations for a total of 16 cards: Merry Christmas!Happy New Year!Happy Crypto Winter!Happy Holidays!Values: 0.01BTC, 0.005BTC 0.002BTC, and 0.001BTCPic of all 16 versions:Cost per set = 0.0035BTC 0.0025BTCPayment should be sent to my forum address only, same as listed on my profile page: 383Nf7ymmNEpuh8TYcXG8oW6SxNUkgq6tGShipping payed by buyer, $5 for USA, $10 for international. Post in the thread or send me a PM if you are interested.Thanks for looking!Geophphreigh

comments.author: MoparMiningLLC
comments.body: to help geo sell his extra sets - for each set sold, I will give (for free) a set of the 2023 holiday ballet wallets I will send them to geophphreigh to include in your packages - so no cost at all for this.

A very generous offer. Geo
